column4: hi! http://paste.ubuntu.com/370847/ is a practical Question. Could you please do it? (I'm not an Ubuntu user yet)
I'm pretty sure that if you delete a file in nautilus over the network, it pops up a warning saying that it can't move it to trash and will actually delete it.
that's from deleting files accessed through Nautilus's ssh support. I don't know if whatever protocol you're talking about does the same.
